title: Drawing, "Fantasy. A staircase in a park, in ruins.", ca. 1760
medium: Black crayon, brush and wash with black ink.
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: The staircase leads to a terrace.  A fountain is beside its left top corner. Another fountain is on the substructure of the terrace at right; water flows from a mask in a shell.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Fantasy. A staircase in a park, in ruins.", ca. 1760.
ca. 1760. Black crayon, brush and wash with black ink.. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1914-21-28.
